article: What Does It Mean if Your Right Foot Itches?
intro: If you get a tingling sensation in your right foot and it just doesn’t

points.name: Common Itchy Right Foot Spiritual Meanings

steps.title: It could be that your itchy foot means luck is on your side.
steps.subtitle: According to some folks, an itchy right foot is just a general sign that you’ve been blessed. You can expect some good fortune coming your way soon, or maybe whatever project you’re undertaking is going to turn out better than you could ever imagine!
sub-points: If you’re religious, this might be a sign that your most recent prayers are going to be answered.

points.name: Itchy Right Foot Superstitions in Different Cultures

steps.title: In Turkish tradition, right foot itching means you’re about to travel.
steps.subtitle: Whether you were planning on it or not, it’s time to pack your bags! In Turkey, an itching right foot means you’re about to hit the road. If you have been yearning for a break, you’ll be happy to know that you’re about to get one.
sub-points: If you’ve been thinking about taking a trip or going to visit a family member but haven’t made up your mind about it, consider the matter settled!

points.name: What should I do if my right foot itches?

steps.title: Don’t scratch or you may bring yourself bad luck!
steps.subtitle: Most people will say that scratching an itchy right foot is a quick way to turn your fortunes upside down. If you think an itchy right foot is a generally good omen, lean into the feeling. Allow yourself to experience the sensation to receive the full omen from the universe.
sub-points: Your itch should go away in a minute or two. If it doesn’t, it’s a sign that your itchy foot isn’t…well, a sign. It’s likely you just have dry skin or a bug bite. Go ahead and scratch it.
Other common reasons your foot might be itching include nerve irritation, eczema, athlete’s foot, or allergic reaction.
